018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase;
019
020import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HConstants.BUCKET_CACHE_IOENGINE_KEY;
021import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HConstants.BUCKET_CACHE_SIZE_KEY;
022import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.CacheConfig.CACHE_BLOCKS_ON_WRITE_KEY;
023import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.CacheConfig.EVICT_BLOCKS_ON_SPLIT_KEY;
024import static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.CacheConfig.PREFETCH_BLOCKS_ON_OPEN_KEY;
025import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
026
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.Collection;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
032import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder;
033import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put;
034import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Table;
035import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TableDescriptor;
036import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TableDescriptorBuilder;
037import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HStoreFile;
038import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.MediumTests;
039import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.MiscTests;
040import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Bytes;
041import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.Pair;
042import org.junit.BeforeClass;
043import org.junit.ClassRule;
044import org.junit.Test;
045import org.junit.experimental.categories.Category;
046import org.slf4j.Logger;
047import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
048
049@Category({ MiscTests.class, MediumTests.class })
050public class TestSplitWithCache {
051
052  @ClassRule
053  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
054    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestSplitWithCache.class);
055
056  private static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(TestSplitWithCache.class);
057
058  private static final HBaseTestingUtil UTIL = new HBaseTestingUtil();
059
060  @BeforeClass
061  public static void setUp() throws Exception {
062    UTIL.getConfiguration().setInt(HConstants.HBASE_CLIENT_META_OPERATION_TIMEOUT, 1000);
063    UTIL.getConfiguration().setInt(HConstants.HBASE_CLIENT_RETRIES_NUMBER, 2);
064    UTIL.getConfiguration().setBoolean(CACHE_BLOCKS_ON_WRITE_KEY, true);
065    UTIL.getConfiguration().setBoolean(PREFETCH_BLOCKS_ON_OPEN_KEY, true);
066    UTIL.getConfiguration().set(BUCKET_CACHE_IOENGINE_KEY, "offheap");
067    UTIL.getConfiguration().setInt(BUCKET_CACHE_SIZE_KEY, 200);
068  }
069
070  @Test
071  public void testEvictOnSplit() throws Exception {
072    doTest("testEvictOnSplit", true,
073      (f, m) -> Waiter.waitFor(UTIL.getConfiguration(), 1000, () -> m.get(f) != null),
074      (f, m) -> Waiter.waitFor(UTIL.getConfiguration(), 1000, () -> m.get(f) == null));
075  }
076
077  @Test
078  public void testDoesntEvictOnSplit() throws Exception {
079    doTest("testDoesntEvictOnSplit", false,
080      (f, m) -> Waiter.waitFor(UTIL.getConfiguration(), 1000, () -> m.get(f) != null),
081      (f, m) -> Waiter.waitFor(UTIL.getConfiguration(), 1000, () -> m.get(f) != null));
082  }
083
084  private void doTest(String table, boolean evictOnSplit,
085    BiConsumer<String, Map<String, Pair<String, Long>>> predicateBeforeSplit,
086    BiConsumer<String, Map<String, Pair<String, Long>>> predicateAfterSplit) throws Exception {
087    UTIL.getConfiguration().setBoolean(EVICT_BLOCKS_ON_SPLIT_KEY, evictOnSplit);
088    UTIL.startMiniCluster(1);
089    try {
090      TableName tableName = TableName.valueOf(table);
091      byte[] family = Bytes.toBytes("CF");
092      TableDescriptor td = TableDescriptorBuilder.newBuilder(tableName)
093        .setColumnFamily(ColumnFamilyDescriptorBuilder.of(family)).build();
094      UTIL.getAdmin().createTable(td);
095      UTIL.waitTableAvailable(tableName);
096      Table tbl = UTIL.getConnection().getTable(tableName);
097      List<Put> puts = new ArrayList<>();
098      for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {
099        Put p = new Put(Bytes.toBytes("row-" + i));
100        p.addColumn(family, Bytes.toBytes(1), Bytes.toBytes("val-" + i));
101        puts.add(p);
102      }
103      tbl.put(puts);
104      UTIL.getAdmin().flush(tableName);
105      Collection<HStoreFile> files =
106        UTIL.getMiniHBaseCluster().getRegions(tableName).get(0).getStores().get(0).getStorefiles();
107      checkCacheForBlocks(tableName, files, predicateBeforeSplit);
108      UTIL.getAdmin().split(tableName, Bytes.toBytes("row-500"));
109      Waiter.waitFor(UTIL.getConfiguration(), 30000,
110        () -> UTIL.getMiniHBaseCluster().getRegions(tableName).size() == 2);
111      UTIL.waitUntilNoRegionsInTransition();
112      checkCacheForBlocks(tableName, files, predicateAfterSplit);
113    } finally {
114      UTIL.shutdownMiniCluster();
115    }
116
117  }
118
119  private void checkCacheForBlocks(TableName tableName, Collection<HStoreFile> files,
120    BiConsumer<String, Map<String, Pair<String, Long>>> checker) {
121    files.forEach(f -> {
122      UTIL.getMiniHBaseCluster().getRegionServer(0).getBlockCache().ifPresent(cache -> {
123        cache.getFullyCachedFiles().ifPresent(m -> {
124          checker.accept(f.getPath().getName(), m);
125        });
126        assertTrue(cache.getFullyCachedFiles().isPresent());
127      });
128    });
129  }
130}
